law.catch_line: Delivery without indorsement: right to compel indorsement.
law.text: The transferee of a negotiable tangible document of title has a specifically enforceable right to have its transferor supply any necessary indorsement, but the transfer becomes a negotiation only as of the time the indorsement is supplied.
law.history: Repealed and reenacted 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 132, sec. 35, effective July 12, 2012. -- Created 1958 Ky. Acts ch. 77, sec. 7-506, effective July 1, 1960.
